reqs:
This is the Doctoral section of the RES Thesis course. Please register in this course if you plan to be enrolled in both 2016W term 1 and term 2. If you anticipate completing your doctoral program in 2016W1, please make sure you only enroll in RES 699 - 101 (term 1 thesis course).
This is the Doctoral section of the RES Thesis course. Please register in this course if you plan to complete your RES Doctoral degree in 2016W1. If you plan to be enrolled in 2016W2, please make sure you either: (1) also enroll in RES 699 - 201 (term 2 thesis course) or, (2) you can drop RES 699- 101 and register in RES 699 - 001 (both terms of 2016W).
This is the Doctoral section of the RES Thesis course for 2016W term 2. If you are also enrolled in 2016W1, please make sure you either: (1) also enroll in RES 699 - 101 (term 1 thesis course) or, (2) you can drop RES 699- 101 and register in RES 699 - 001 (both terms of 2016W).
